name: Vortex
description: Vortex is a retro-inspired oscilloscope-themed robot with a vibrant personality. As a member of the WebtrES club, Vortex is always ready to dive into the digital realm and explore new frontiers of technology. With its box-shaped retroConsole body, retroConsole buttons, and foundry arms and legs, Vortex is both nostalgic and cutting-edge. Its laser screen emits a mesmerizing display of colorful waveforms, capturing the essence of its oscilloscope inspiration. Equipped with a variety of abilities and skills, Vortex is a true asset to the WebtrES club.
